text: Alloh az şaʙ kam mekunadu ʙa rūz meafzojad va az rūz kam mekunadu ʙa şaʙ meafzojad va oftoʙu mohro rom kard. Har jake to zamone muajjan dar harakatand. In ast Alloh, Parvardigori şumo. Farmonravoī az oni Ūst. Cizhoero, ki ƣajri Ū ma'ʙudi xeş mexoned, moliki pūsti mijoni donai xurmoe ham nestand
